---
description: Tip a Tellor reporter for the data that you need.
---

# Sending a Tip

For data that is not getting reported as part of the cycle list, a tip is required.

The command for sending a tip looks like this:

{% code overflow="wrap" %}
```bash
# ./layerd tx oracle tip [tipper] [query_data] [amount] [flags]
./layerd tx oracle tip $TELLOR_ADDRESS  1000000loya --fees 5loya
```
{% endcode %}

_The query\_data shown here is for usdc-usd-spot . To generate query\_data for the query that you need, check out the_ [_"querybuilder" tool here._](https://tellor.io/queryidstation/)&#x20;
